text: Owange ggwe omubaka, tebakunakuwazanga abo abavuganya mu kuwakanya(obwannabbi bwo), mu abo abagamba n'emimwa gyaabwe nti tukkirizza so nga e mitima gyabwe tegikkiriza. Ne mu Bayudaaya abakkiriza e bigambo byobulimba, era abawuliriza kulwa bantu abalala ababa tebazze mu nkungaanazo nebakyusa e bigambo okubiggya mu bifo byabyo nga bagamba (bannaabwe nti), bwemuweebwa kino mukitwale, bwekitabaweebwa mwekeke, naye Katonda gwaba ayagadde okugezesa toyinza kumuyamba mu kintu kyonna ewa Katonda, abo beebo Katonda baatayagala kutukuza mitima gyaabwe, obuswaavu buli ku bo kuno ku nsi, era ne ku lunaku lwâ€™enkomerero bagenda kussibwaako ebibonerezo ebikambwe
